mapper.select: SELECT MOVIE.MOVIE_IMG AS mvImg, MOVIE.MOVIE_TITLE AS mvTitle, MOVIE.MOVIE_STAR AS mvStar, MOVIE.MOVIE_DETAIL AS mvDetail , MOVIE.MOVIE_DIRECTOR AS mvDirector, MOVIE.MOVIE_ID AS mvId FROM MOVIE WHERE MOVIE_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT MOVIE_TITLE AS mvTitle, MOVIE_STAR AS mvStar, MOVIE_DETAIL AS mvDetail, MOVIE_DIRECTOR AS mvDirector, MOVIE_ID AS mvId, MOVIE_OPENDATE AS openDate, MOVIE_IMG AS mvImg FROM MOVIE WHERE MOVIE_OPENDATE <= SYSDATE ORDER BY MOVIE_OPENDATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT MOVIE.MOVIE_TITLE AS mvTitle, MOVIE.MOVIE_STAR AS mvStar, MOVIE.MOVIE_DETAIL AS mvDetail , MOVIE.MOVIE_DIRECTOR AS mvDirector, MOVIE.MOVIE_ID AS mvId, MOVIE.MOVIE_IMG AS mvImg, MOVIE.MOVIE_OPENDATE AS openDate, GENRE.GENRE AS genre2 FROM MOVIE JOIN GENRE ON GENRE.MOVIE_ID = MOVIE.MOVIE_ID WHERE MOVIE.MOVIE_ID = #{movie_id}
